title: Border, late 17th–early 18th century
medium:
Medium: muslin
Technique: deflected element work (drawnwork and embroidery)
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Scalloped muslin border showing intertwining floral garland and ribbon in an asymmetric pattern.
